snippet: Bank of America apologized Wednesday for a double-billing glitch that affected some customers who made purchases with Apple Pay, the new mobile payments service that Apple launched this week....

headline.print_headline: BofA to Refund Apple Pay Customers Charged Twice
headline.main: BofA to Refund Apple Pay Customers Charged Twice

lead_paragraph: Bank of America apologized Wednesday for a double-billing glitch that affected some customers who made purchases with Apple Pay, the new mobile payments service that Apple launched this week.
